key_risk_themes: ["Dependency Management & Versioning Integrity","Architectural Purity Enforcement","Data Contract Accuracy & Test Coverage"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Establish and automate a strict Semantic Versioning (SemVer) policy in the CI/CD pipeline to prevent breaking changes.","Configure the CI/CD pipeline to enforce quality gates: blocking forbidden dependencies and mandating high test coverage.","Formalize a pull request review process that requires cross-referencing schema changes against source requirements and database designs."]
